item.title: 中国地方政府债券热潮加剧流动性紧张
item.description: 中国地方政府急于发行债券为隐性债务再融资，进一步收紧了金融体系的流动性。【原文：China’s local governments are rushing to issue bonds to refinance hidden debt, further tightening liquidity in the financial system.】

item.title: 中国开发商在住房规定放宽后溢价购地
item.description: 中国政府放宽了对房价的限制，以重振四年多来一直拖累经济的低迷市场，在此之后，中国国有背景的开发商又开始高价购买土地。【原文：Chinese state-backed developers are starting to buy land at a premium again after the government eased limits on home prices to revive a slumping market that’s been a drag on the economy for more than four years.】

item.title: 奥兰集团确认向沙特基金出售农业业务股权
item.description: Olam Group Ltd. 已确认将以 17.8 亿美元的价格向一家沙特国有投资公司出售其农业综合企业 44.6% 的股份。【原文：Olam Group Ltd. has confirmed it will sell its 44.6% stake in its agribusiness to a state-owned Saudi investment firm for $1.78 billion.】

item.title: 新西兰零售销售反弹标志经济衰退已结束
item.description: 2024 年最后三个月，新西兰的零售支出出现反弹，这进一步表明，较低的利率正在帮助新西兰经济走出衰退。【原文：New Zealand retail spending rebounded in the final three months of 2024, adding to signs that lower interest rates are helping the economy emerge from recession.】

item.title: 华尔街暴跌后亚洲股市将下跌：市场综述
item.description: 由于美国经济数据乏善可陈，华尔街创下了今年以来最差的一个交易日，亚洲股市随之下跌。欧元在德国大选后走强。【原文：Stocks in Asia were primed to fall after Wall Street notched up its worst session of the year on lacklustre US economic data. The euro strengthened following an election in Germany.】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 低迷的石油交易商将在本周伦敦举行的一次重要能源会议上寻找线索。由于市场提供了套利机会，黄金继续涌入美国。欧洲的液化天然气价格随着供应担忧的减弱而显示出缓和的迹象。【原文：Subdued oil traders will be looking for clues at a major energy conference in London this week. Gold continues to pour into the US as the market provides arbitrage opportunities. And the price of liquefied natural gas in Europe is showing signs of easing as supply concerns take a step back.】

item.title: WiseTech 董事会辞职，创始人怀特赢得权力斗争
item.description: 慧科全球有限公司（WiseTech Global Ltd. ）的创始人兼最大股东理查德-怀特（Richard White）似乎在一场高层权力纷争中取得了胜利，此前几乎所有董事会成员都因对这位亿万富翁在公司中的角色产生分歧而退出了董事会。公司股价暴跌。【原文：WiseTech Global Ltd.’s founder and largest shareholder Richard White appears to have triumphed in a high-level power dispute after almost every board member quit in a disagreement over the billionaire’s role at the company. The shares slumped.】

item.title: 伊拉克将从库尔德斯坦获得 18.5 万桶石油，出口即将重启
item.description: 伊拉克石油部一位副部长周日告诉国营伊拉克通讯社，在恢复通过输油管道向土耳其出口原油后，伊拉克每天将从库尔德斯坦半自治地区获得约 18.5 万桶原油，但未提供具体时间。【原文：Iraq will receive around 185,000 barrels of crude oil a day from the semi-autonomous region of Kurdistan after exports resume via a pipeline to Turkey, a deputy Iraqi oil minister told the state-run Iraqi News Agency on Sunday without providing a time frame.】

item.title: 财报季只会让首席财务官更难做
item.description:
面对不确定性，企业希望降低成本，提高效率。此外，空中客车公司的财务总监将谈论关税、国防开支和供应链。【原文：

Facing uncertainty, companies look to trim costs and become more efficient. Plus, the finance chief of Airbus talks about tariffs, defense spending and supply chains.

】

item.title: 瑞曼医疗保健公司大幅折价 5.7 亿美元削减债务
item.description: 新西兰退休村业主莱曼医疗保健公司（Ryman Healthcare）将以大幅折价的方式融资 10 亿新西兰元（约合 5.7 亿美元），以加强其资产负债表，这是该公司重振经营业绩的最新举措。【原文：New Zealand retirement village owner Ryman Healthcare is raising NZ$1 billion ($570 million) at a deep discount to strengthen its balance sheet in the latest step to revive business performance.】

item.title: 前贸易顾问称特朗普征收金属关税的主要目标是中国
item.description: 白宫前贸易顾问表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对铝和钢征收关税的主要动机是担心中国充斥全球市场，损害美国制造业。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s tariffs on aluminum and steel are motivated mostly by concerns that China is flooding the global market and harming US manufacturing, said a former trade adviser to the White House.】

item.title: 美联储古尔斯比淡化通胀预期跳升
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长奥斯坦-古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）淡化了上周发布的一份报告，该报告显示消费者对未来通胀的预期有所上升。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee downplayed a report released last week that showed an increase in consumers’ expectations for future inflation.】

item.title: 埃及称停火后数十艘船只返回苏伊士运河
item.description: 埃及苏伊士运河管理局称，自 2 月初以来，已有 47 艘船只改道使用该水道，这是在以色列与哈马斯停火促使也门叛军减少对红海航运的袭击之后出现的暂时性复苏。【原文：Egypt’s Suez Canal Authority said 47 ships have rerouted to use the waterway since the start of February, a tentative recovery after a ceasefire between Israel and Hamas prompted Yemeni rebels to scale back attacks on Red Sea shipping.】

item.title: 孟加拉国领导人邀请马斯克访问并启动 "星链 "服务
item.description: 孟加拉国临时领导人穆罕默德-尤努斯（Muhammad Yunus）邀请 SpaceX 公司首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）访问该国，并在那里发射他的 Starlink 卫星互联网服务。【原文：Bangladesh’s interim leader, Muhammad Yunus, invited SpaceX Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk to visit the country and launch his Starlink satellite internet service there.】

item.title: 拉美投资者正在酝酿一场提前选举交易
item.description: 对左翼政府日益增长的不满情绪正在助长拉丁美洲的涨势，交易商们以最低估值抢购资产，因为他们提前押注 2026 年的下一波选举将迎来更有利于商业的政权。【原文：Growing discontent with left-wing governments is helping fuel a rally in Latin America, with traders scooping up assets at rock-bottom valuations on early bets the next wave of elections in 2026 will usher in more business-friendly regimes.】

item.title: 苹果凭借 iPhone 16e 放弃经济型智能手机市场
item.description: 上周，苹果公司推出了期待已久的 iPhone SE 后继机型：iPhone 16e。这样一来，苹果几乎放弃了经济型智能手机市场。此外：该公司准备推出 M4 MacBook Air，并确认 Vision Pro 将采用苹果智能技术。此外，初创公司 Humane 向惠普出售了自己，并关闭了 Ai Pin，我们还了解了苹果将其新调制解调器组件与设备中的主芯片合并的计划。【原文：Last week, Apple introduced the long-awaited successor to the iPhone SE: the iPhone 16e. In doing so, it all but abandoned the budget smartphone market. Also: The company prepares to launch the M4 MacBook Air and confirms that Apple Intelligence is coming to the Vision Pro. Plus, startup Humane sells itself to HP and shuts down the Ai Pin, and we have an inside look at Apple’s plan to merge its new modem component with the main chips in its devices.】

item.title: 股市 "FOMO "效应在美国暂歇，动能向海外转移
item.description: 在过去两年里，动物精神让美国股市一飞冲天，如今这种精神正走向全球；一些市场专业人士认为，这种趋势可能才刚刚开始。【原文：The animal spirits that sent the US stock market flying over the past two years are going global — a trend that some market pros say may be just getting started.】

item.title: 德国紧缩大选令市场渴求更多支出
item.description: 德国多年来赌注最大的选举正在为增加支出铺平道路，市场预测受限制的财政政策时代即将结束。【原文：Germany’s highest-stakes election in years is paving the way for a pivot to increased spending, with markets predicting the end of an era for constrained fiscal policy.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》称，申银万国去年利润下降，进一步挑战 IPO
item.description: 英国《金融时报》援引未透露身份的人士的话报道称，快速时尚零售商Shein去年的利润下滑了近40%，这给其可能在英国进行的首次公开募股带来了进一步的压力。【原文：Fast-fashion retailer Shein’s profit slumped by almost 40% last year, putting further pressure on a potential initial public offering in the UK, the Financial Times reported, citing people it didn’t identify.】

item.title: 资产管理公司不断推出曾被视为不可投资的国防基金
item.description: 随着欧洲各国政府加大国防开支，以前认为该领域争议太大而不敢触碰的基金经理们也开始注意到这一点。【原文：As governments across Europe ratchet up defense spending, money managers who previously judged the sector too controversial to touch are taking note.】

item.title: 据《先锋报》报道，欧洲央行行长埃斯克里瓦呼吁 "谨慎 "决策
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员何塞-路易斯-埃斯克里瓦（Jose Luis Escriva）表示，鉴于当前 "异常的不确定性"，必须谨慎对待货币政策。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Jose Luis Escriva said monetary policy must be approached with caution given the current “extraordinary uncertainty.”】

item.title: 南非停电跃升至一年来最高水平
item.description: 在国家公用事业公司的多个发电机组发生故障后，南非的电力配给一年来首次恢复到最高水平，这引发了人们对该公司业绩好转的质疑。【原文：South Africa’s electricity rationing returned to the highest level for the first time in a year after multiple generating units at the state utility failed, raising questions about the turnaround in the company’s performance.】

item.title: 警方从柬埔寨诈骗中心释放 215 名外国公民
item.description: 泰国当局称，警方在突袭柬埔寨西北部的一个网上诈骗中心时解救了 215 名外国公民，这是该地区打击网络犯罪活动的最新行动。【原文：Police rescued 215 foreign nationals in a raid on an online scam center in northwestern Cambodia, Thai authorities said, in the latest crackdown on criminal cyber operations in the region.】

item.title: 不情愿的英国消费者是基尔-斯塔默的难题
item.description: 对于仍在工党首份预算案阴影中徘徊的英国消费者来说，谨慎是他们的座右铭。【原文：For British consumers still reeling from Labour’s first budget, the watchword is caution.】

item.title: 中国敦促美国停止将经贸事务武器化
item.description: 中国呼吁美国停止将经济和贸易问题政治化和武器化，因为华盛顿正试图根据唐纳德-特朗普总统的 "美国优先 "政策限制北京的海外投资。【原文：China called on the US to stop politicizing and weaponizing economic and trade issues, as Washington tries to limit overseas investments by Beijing in line with President Donald Trump’s “America First” policy.】

item.title: 伯克希尔将逐步增持日本贸易公司股份
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）在致股东的年度信中表示，伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway Inc.【原文：Berkshire Hathaway Inc. is looking to increase ownership in Japan’s five largest trading houses “over time,” Warren Buffett said in an annual letter to shareholders that is likely to support their share prices in Tokyo.】

item.title: 澳大利亚查莫斯公司向贝森特公司施压要求免除关税
item.description: 澳大利亚财政部长吉姆-查莫斯（Jim Chalmers）表示，他将于周日晚些时候前往华盛顿特区，因为美国的盟友正在为其不受关税约束而施压。【原文：Australian Treasurer Jim Chalmers said he would be traveling to Washington DC later on Sunday as the US ally presses its case to be excluded from tariffs.】

item.title: 美元缓和令全球资金重返亚洲新兴股市
item.description: 随着美元涨势暂停，以及美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的初步关税攻势被证明没有早先预想的那么具有惩罚性，投资者对亚洲新兴市场股市的热情正在升温。【原文：Investors are warming up toward Asian emerging-market stocks as the dollar’s rally pauses and US President Donald Trump’s initial tariff onslaught proves less punishing than earlier envisaged.】

item.title: 特朗普团队推动墨西哥对中国进口产品加征关税
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，特朗普政府告诉墨西哥官员，他们应该对中国进口商品征收本国关税，以此作为避免唐纳德-特朗普总统威胁征收关税的努力的一部分。【原文：The Trump administration told Mexican officials that they should put their own duties on Chinese imports as part of their efforts to avoid tariffs threatened by President Donald Trump, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美联储青睐的通胀指标将降至七个月低点
item.description: 美联储首选的通胀指标预计将降温至 6 月份以来最慢的速度，但在抑制整体物价压力方面的缓慢进展将使决策者对进一步降息保持谨慎。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s preferred inflation metric is expected to cool to the slowest pace since June, but glacial progress on taming price pressures overall will keep policymakers cautious about lowering interest rates further.】
